TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class XPathNodeIterator : ICloneable, System.Collections.IEnumerable
.class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit XPathNodeIterator extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.ICloneable
Public MustInherit Class XPathNodeIterator Implements ICloneable, IEnumerable
public ref class XPathNodeIterator abstract : ICloneable, System::Collections::IEnumerable
type XPathNodeIterator = class interface ICloneable interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 在选定节点集上提供一个迭代器。

span.span: Provides an iterator over a selected set of nodes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回对象类没有定位在所选组节点中的第一个节点上。An object returned by the class is not positioned on the first node in a selected set of nodes. 调用方法必须使类来定位所选节点集中的第一个节点上的对象。A call to the method of the class must be made to position the object on the first node in the selected set of nodes. 当使用，如果编辑当前节点或任何其的上级，当前位置将会丢失。When using the , if you edit the current node or any of its ancestors, your current position is lost. 如果你想要编辑的节点数，已选择，创建数组中复制所有从节点到数组，然后循环访问数组并修改节点。If you want to edit a number of nodes that you have selected, create a array, copy all of the nodes from the into the array, then iterate through the array and modify the nodes. 有两种方法来循环访问通过使用集合类。There are two ways to iterate over an collection by using the class. 一种方法是使用方法，然后调用若要获取当前实例，如以下示例所示：One way is to use the method and then call to get the current instance, as in the following example: [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#55)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#55)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#55)] 另一种方法是使用`foreach`循环来调用方法，并使用返回的接口来枚举的节点，如以下示例所示：Another way is to use a `foreach` loop to call the method and use the returned interface to enumerate the nodes, as in the following example: [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#56)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#56)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#56)] 应使用并或使用。You should either use and or use . 结合这两种方法可能会导致意外的结果。Combining these two approaches can cause unexpected results. 例如，如果首先，调用方法，然后中调用方法`foreach`循环中，`foreach`循环不会启动枚举结果从一开始的集合，但从之后的位置方法。For example, if the method is called first, and then the method is called in the `foreach` loop, the `foreach` loop will not start enumerating the results from the beginning of the collection, but from the position after the method. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法类来选择节点集使用类。The following example uses the method of the class to select a node set using the class. [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#39](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#39)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#39](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#39)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#39](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#39)] 该示例使用 `books.xml` 文件作为输入。The example takes the `books.xml` file as input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在派生的类构造函数来初始化此类型中的状态将调用此构造函数。This constructor is called by derived class constructors to initialize state in this type.

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，返回此 对象的复本。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns a clone of this object.

returns.span: 此 对象的新 对象复本。

span.span: A new object clone of this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 克隆对象定位在同一个节点中的节点集如果对进行了调用方法。The cloned object is positioned at the same node in the node set if calls have been made to the method. 克隆对象不受对此的后续更改对象。The cloned object is not affected by subsequent changes to this object.

public: virtual property int Count { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取所选节点集中最后一个节点的索引。

span.span: Gets the index of the last node in the selected set of nodes.

value.span: 所选节点集中最后一个节点的索引或者 0 （如果没有选择节点）。

span.span: The index of the last node in the selected set of nodes, or 0 if there are no selected nodes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性不会影响的位置。The property does not affect the position of the .

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property Current As XPathNavigator
public: abstract property System::Xml::XPath::XPathNavigator ^ Current { System::Xml::XPath::XPathNavigator ^ get(); };

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，获取此 的 对象，它定位在当前上下文节点上。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the object for this , positioned on the current context node.

value.span: 对象，定位在从中选择节点集的上下文节点上。

span.span: An object positioned on the context node from which the node set was selected.

value.span: 必须调用 方法将 移至所选集中的第一个节点。

span.span: The method must be called to move the to the first node in the selected set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用返回的属性对象，以获取当前节点的信息。You can use the properties of the returned object to obtain information on the current node. 但是，返回不应修改对象。However, the returned object should not be modified. 返回对象不能移开所选的节点集。The returned object cannot be moved away from the selected node set. 或者，可以克隆对象使用方法的类。Alternatively, you can clone the object using the method of the class. 克隆对象然后离开所选的节点集。The cloned object can then be moved away from the selected node set. 此方法的克隆对象可能会影响将 XPath 查询的性能。This method of cloning the object might affect the performance of the XPath query. 如果， ，并方法导致没有选中，节点属性不可能指向上下文节点。If the , , and methods result in no nodes being selected, the property might not be pointing to the context node. 若要测试是否已选择节点，请使用属性，如以下示例所示。To test whether nodes have been selected, use the property as shown in the following example. ## Examples 下面的示例获取由 Herman Melville 使用创作的所有书名的属性对象和方法的类。The following example gets all book titles authored by Herman Melville using the property of the object and the method of the class. [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#6)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#6)] 该示例使用 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件作为输入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property CurrentPosition As Integer
public: abstract property int CurrentPosition { int get(); };

summary.span: 当在派生的类中重写时，获取所选节点集中当前位置的索引。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the index of the current position in the selected set of nodes.
The index of the current position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引从 1 开始。The index is 1-based. 因此，第一个节点的索引为 1。Therefore, the first node has an index of 1. 索引为 0 指示没有所选的节点。An index of 0 indicates there are no selected nodes. 此属性始终返回一个正整数。This property always returns a positive integer.

summary.span: 返回 对象以循环访问所选的节点集。

span.span: Returns an object to iterate through the selected node set.

returns.span: 循环访问所选节点集的 对象。

span.span: An object to iterate through the selected node set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举器定位在的当前位置上对象。The enumerator is positioned on the current position of the object. 有两种方法来循环访问通过使用集合类。There are two ways to iterate over an collection by using the class. 一种方法是使用方法，然后调用若要获取当前实例，如以下示例所示：One way is to use the method and then call to get the current instance, as in the following example: [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#55)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#55)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#55)] 另一种方法是使用`foreach`循环来调用方法，并使用返回的接口来枚举的节点，如以下示例所示：Another way is to use a `foreach` loop to call the method and use the returned interface to enumerate the nodes, as in the following example: [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#56)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#56)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#56)] 应使用方法和或使用方法。You should either use the method and or use the method. 结合这两种方法可能会导致意外的结果。Combining these two approaches can cause unexpected results. 例如，如果首先，调用方法，然后中调用方法`foreach`循环中，`foreach`循环不会启动枚举结果从一开始的集合，但从之后的位置方法。For example, if the method is called first, and then the method is called in the `foreach` loop, the `foreach` loop will not start enumerating the results from the beginning of the collection, but from the position after the method.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，将 属性返回的 对象移至选定节点集中的下一个节点。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, moves the object returned by the property to the next node in the selected node set.

returns.span: 如果 对象已移至下一个节点，则为 ；如果没有其他选定节点，则为 。

span.span: if the object moved to the next node; if there are no more selected nodes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象定位在选定的节点仅在首次调用后设置中的第一个节点上方法。The object is positioned on the first node in the selected node set only after the initial call to the method. 按文档顺序创建节点组。The node set is created in document order. 因此，调用方法将移动到按文档顺序排列的下一个节点。Therefore, calling the method moves to the next node in document order. 有两种方法来循环访问通过使用集合类。There are two ways to iterate over an collection by using the class. 一种方法是使用方法，然后调用若要获取当前实例，如以下示例所示：One way is to use the method and then call to get the current instance, as in the following example: [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#55)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#55)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#55](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#55)] 另一种方法是使用`foreach`循环来调用方法，并使用返回的接口来枚举的节点，如以下示例所示：Another way is to use a `foreach` loop to call the method and use the returned interface to enumerate the nodes, as in the following example: [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#56)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#56)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#56](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#56)] 应使用方法和或使用方法。You should either use the method and or use the method. 结合这两种方法可能会导致意外的结果。Combining these two approaches can cause unexpected results. 例如，如果首先，调用方法，然后中调用方法`foreach`循环中，`foreach`循环不会启动枚举结果从一开始的集合，但从之后的位置方法。For example, if the method is called first, and then the method is called in the `foreach` loop, the `foreach` loop will not start enumerating the results from the beginning of the collection, but from the position after the method. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法类来选择节点集使用类。The following example uses the method of the class to select a node set using the class. [!code-cpp[XPathNavigatorMethods#39](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CPP/xpathnavigatormethods.cpp#39)] [!code-csharp[XPathNavigatorMethods#39](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/CS/xpathnavigatormethods.cs#39)] [!code-vb[XPathNavigatorMethods#39](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathNavigatorMethods/VB/xpathnavigatormethods.vb#39)] 该示例使用 `books.xml` 文件作为输入。The example takes the `books.xml` file as input. ```xml The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin Benjamin Franklin 8.99 The Confidence Man Herman Melville 11.99 The Gorgias Plato 9.99 ```

summary.span: 创建作为当前实例副本的新对象。

span.span: Creates a new object that is a copy of the current instance.

returns.span: 作为此实例副本的新对象。

span.span: A new object that is a copy of this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
